title: How to Use Tensorflow for Classification (LIVE)
excerpt: In this live session I'll introduce & give an overview of Google's Deep Learning library, Tensorflow. Then we'll use it to build a neural network capable of predicting housing prices, with me explaining every step along the way.  Code for this video: https://github.com/llSourcell/How_to_use_Tensorflow_for_classification-LIVE
